title: What are the different types of beers in the World?
description: In this post we summarize the different categories and styles of beer.
author: ilanreinstein

inquiries.text: What is the most common category?
What is the mean alchohol volume by category?
How many styles are in each category?

title: Who is the greatest driver in the Formula One history?
description: In the end it all comes to the driver of the car, who is responsible for pushing the car to its limits in order to give a nice show, let's see how this holds with some data
author: ilanreinstein

inquiries.text: Who is the driver with most poles?
Who is the driver with most wins?
What is the correlation between poles and wins by driver?
Who is the best driver by fastest laps?

title: How the teams performed in the World Cup?
description: In soccer there is not much importance in this rankings because the winners already took the trophy home and nobody cares whether they played a flawless tournament or if they had several difficulties.
author: ilanreinstein

inquiries.text: What team is the champion by points?
What team is the champion by goal difference?
What team is the champion by clean sheet?

title: What is the social condition of the  participating countries in the World Cup?
description: In this blogpost we will be using socio-economic data to analyze a little bit further each of the competing countries in the WC.
author: ilanreinstein

inquiries.text: What is the population in the participating countries?
What is the income per capita in the participating countries?
What is the relation between the income rank and the FIFA rank?
What is the relation between the human development rank and the FIFA rank?
What is the corruption rank in each country given the stability (violence) and its development?

title: Â¿How much do countries invest in R&D?
description: In this blogpost we show the investment in science in a small set of countries.
author: ilanreinstein

inquiries.text: What is the GDP of each country?
What is the R&D budget?

title: How stable has been the economy in the US and the UK?
description: In this blogpost we compare the income and wealth of these two countries over time.
author: ilanreinstein

inquiries.text: What has been the change in population over the years?
What has been the national income?
What has been the private wealth?
What has been the income per capita?
What has been the private wealth per capita?

title: What are the main energy sources used in Latin America?
description: We explore the different ways of generating electricity in South America and the Caribbean.
author: ilanreinstein

inquiries.text: What percentage of the total energy consumption comes from fossil resources?
What percentage of the total energy consumption comes from alternative resources?
What percentage of the total energy consumption comes from renewable resources?

title: What role does electricity plays in the economy?
description: We explore variables that relate energy consumption to a country's economy
author: ilanreinstein

inquiries.text: What is the energy intensity?
What is the consumption per capita?
What is the relation between the consumption and the intensity?
